message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product at a special price of $16,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more than that to me. How about we settle at $14,000?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I still feel there might be room for negotiation. Would you consider $12,500 for the product?
